# Strategy: Nested JRT | COST+MO / LLY+NVO / PGR+COKE
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/PxxyRCCfleYAiQGkfXKm/details

**Complexity**: Low (3/10)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 6 assets:

• **Stocks**: COST, MO, LLY, NVO, PGR, COKE

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ Nested JRT:
    ▪ Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
      - COST || MO - XLP:
        - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
          (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
          Assets: COST, MO
          - Buy COST (100% of portfolio)
          - Buy MO (100% of portfolio)
      - LLY || NVO - Pharma:
        - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
          (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
          Assets: LLY, NVO
          - Buy LLY (100% of portfolio)
          - Buy NVO (100% of portfolio)
      - PGR || COKE - Misc:
        - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
          (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
          Assets: PGR, COKE
          - Buy PGR (100% of portfolio)
          - Buy COKE (100% of portfolio)
```

## Technical Details
• **Source Platform**: Composer
• **Source ID**: PxxyRCCfleYAiQGkfXKm
• **Created**: June 27, 2025
• **Slippage Model**: 0.10% per trade
